Event.name: Setting_fire
Event.definition:
<def-root>This frame describes either the creation of a <fen>Flame</fen> by a <fen>Kindler</fen> or non-sentient <fen>Cause</fen>, or the igniting of <fen>Flammables</fen> by a <fen>Kindler</fen> or a <fen>Cause</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Kindler">Taliban militants</fex> recently <t>set fire</t> <fex name="Flammables">to several schools</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Flame">The fire</fex> <t>ignited</t>. <fex name="Cause">CNI</fex></ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Kindler
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Kindler</fen> is the person performing the intentional act. <ex> <fex name="Kindler">Mark</fex> <t>started</t> the fire with a magnifying glass. </ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Flame
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Flame</fen> is what is created by the Kindler. <ex>Oscar <t>started</t> <fex name="Flame">the fire</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Flammables
Arg.definition: <def-root>The Flamables is the the object that is set on fire by the Kindler. <ex>Tracy <t>set</t> <fex name="Flammables">the couch</fex> <t>on fire</t>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Cause
Arg.definition: <def-root>The cause of the fire. <ex><fex name="Cause">A spark</fex> <t>ignited</t> the curtains.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the event occurs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the event takes place.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>Any description of the intentional act which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (<ment>quietly, loudly</ment>), and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>). In addition, it may indicate salient characteristics of a <fen>Kindler</fen> that also affect the action (<ment>presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully</ment>). </def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>An event brought about by the <fen>Cause</fen> or the <fen>Kindler</fen> that actually makes the <fen>Flammables</fen> catch fire.</def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>The Explanation denotes a proposition from which the main clause (headed by the target) logically follows.</def-root>

Arg.name: Containing_event
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE denotes an event that occurs or state of affairs that holds at a time that includes the time during which the event or state of affairs reported by the target occurs and of which it is taken to be a part.</def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE describes the <fen>Kindler</fen> as being in some state during the action.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: light.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: ignite something. "Alan gathered sticks and lit a fire."

lexUnit.name: torch.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: set fire to. "The shops had been looted and torched."

lexUnit.name: kindle.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: light (a flame); set on fire.

lexUnit.name: set on fire.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: cause to burn with flames; caused by an initial combustion such as a spark or ignition

lexUnit.name: catch on fire.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: cause to be on fire.
